loans.name: Cinesio

texts.es:
El Sr. Cinesio tiene 51 años es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, quien vive en la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, esta casado con la señora Carmen hace mas de 27 años de los cuales tienen dos hijas.
Él se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, y comenta que por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y haberles dado una vida digna. Es una persona que desde siempre se ha esforzado y está luchando para hacerlo.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de animales para la cría.
texts.en:
Cinesio is 51 years old and is a very hard-working and responsible person who lives in the city of Coronel Oviedo. He has been married to Carmen for 27 years and in this time they have had two daughters. He makes a living raising and selling animals, and says that through his work he has the means to be able to help his family and to have given them a decent life. He is someone who has always worked hard and is striving to do so.

He is asking for this loan to buy animals to raise.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado “Nuevo Amanecer” está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres integrado por 17 mujeres todos ellas vecinas y amigas del lugar, hacen todo lo posible para salir adelante con sus familias. Estas señoras trabajan de manera unida y se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Nilda es una de las integrantes de este grupo, quien se dedica a ser modista, es muy buena en lo que hace, es por ello que tiene ya muy buena clientela, es por eso que le va muy bien. Nilda está poniendo todo de sí para poder crecer y mejorar, es por eso que está contenta por formar parte del programa de comité de mujeres.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, gomas y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus confecciones y cumplir con la alta demanda de sus clientes, agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y mejorando cada día.
texts.en:
The group Nuevo Amanecer is in its sixth cycle with the Women's Committee Program. It is made up of 17 women, all neighbors and friends, who are doing everything they can to get ahead with their families. These ladies are working together and helping each other.

Nilda is one of the members of this group, who works as a dressmaker. She is very good at what she does, so she has many good customers. This means that it is going very well for her. Nilda is giving her all to be able to grow and improve, which is why she is happy to be part of the Women's Committee Program.

She is requesting this loan to buy fabric, threads, elastic and other things, so that she can continue with her dressmaking, and meet the high demands of her customers. She is grateful for the opportunity which she is receiving to be able to continue growing and improving every day.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, elastic and other supplies for dressmaking.

loans.name: Las Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Unidas está en su ciclo número 10 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde trabajan en equipo para así poder cumplir con sus anhelos y metas. Todas ellas participan activamente en las actividades propuestas por el grupo, se ayudan mutuamente para llegar a los objetivos en común que tienen dentro del  grupo. 
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Clara, que con mucho esfuerzo a logrado aumentar los productos que ofrece en su despensa, comenta que empezó con muy poco, pero poco a poco ha ido creciendo y mejorando. Ella lucha y pone todo lo mejor de si, ya que por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
La Sra. Clara solicita  este préstamo para la compra de productos  varios, para la despensa como verduras, frutas, productos a granel, lácteos y con ello poder surtirse y ofrecer una mejor variedad para sus clientes, ya que quiere ir mejorando cada vez más.
texts.en:
The Las Unidas group is in its 10th loan cycle of the women's committee programme, where they work as a team in order to be able to achieve their hopes and goals. They all participate actively in the activities proposed by the group. They help each other in order to achieve the common objectives they have within the group.

One of the members is Clara, who with a great deal of effort has managed to increase the products she offers in her store. She says that she started with very little, but she has gradually grown and improved. She works hard and puts her all into it, since through her work she helps her family and her loved ones. 

Clara is asking for this loan to buy various products for the store such as fruit, vegetables, bulk products and dairy products so that with these she can stock up and offer a better variety for her customers, because she wants to keep improving all the time.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, bulk products, dairy products and other items to stock her store.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo es de la ciudad de Encarnación, actualmente tiene un negocio ya hace mas de 5 años vende productos de todo tipo y también vende saldo electrónico.
Es una persona que pone todo de sí para poder mejorar cada día para dar a sus seres queridos una calidad de vida mejor. El pide este préstamo para poder comprar saldo electrónico para la venta y también para poder comprar artículos varios para la venta.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is from the city of Encarnación. Currently he has a business which he has had for 5 years selling all kinds of products and he also sells electronic credit. He is a person who puts his all into improving every day in order to give his loved ones a better quality of life.

He is asking for this loan so he can buy electronic credit to sell and also to buy various items to sell.

loans.use: to buy electronic credit to sell and also to buy various items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional stock of cooking oil and baking flour

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хуршед серьезный, активный и мужчина, который не боявшейся трудится. Он дехканин города Куляб. Ему 36 лет.  Хуршед семейный мужчина. Жена занимается растениеводством. Сам Хуршед в течение 15 лет занимается земледелием. Он уже успешный дехканин, потому что Хуршед идет по стопам отца. Его отец тоже занимался земледелием, научил Хуршеда, чтобы он в дальнейшем продвигал его деятельность. Сейчас Хуршед нуждается в кредит, для купли  минеральных удобрений для нового посева. Он верит в Вас  и надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Khurshed is serious and active, and he is a man unafraid of work. He is a farmer from the town of Kulob. He is 36 years old. Khurshed is a family man. His wife grows crops. Khurshed himself has been farming for 15 years. He is already a successful farmer because Khurshed is following in his father's footsteps. His father also farmed, and taught Khurshed so that he could continue his business in the future. Now Khurshed needs a loan to buy mineral fertilizer for sewing a new crop. He believes in you and hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 60 years old, married to Doris and supports a family of 6 children. 

He has been operating in soft drinks sales for the last 19 years earning KES 13,500 per month. 

Joseph has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a refrigerator to chill the drinks to satisfy client's demand and create more profit. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to educate his children and to buy land for rental construction. 

His future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable with large rental estates.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for chilling soft drinks

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Liza is 32 years old and has two children still in school.

Liza has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP16,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy assorted fish to sell in her food stall.

Liza has been in this business for seven years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy assorted fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a 48-year-old married woman with six children, two of whom are still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Gladys has a manicure and pedicure business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials for manicure and pedicure service.

Gladys has been in this business for 4 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials for manicure and pedicure services

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 51 years old, married and has three children. 

Gemma is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Gemma has been farming rice for 30 years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gemma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en:
Mary Joy is 31 years old and is a married woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Mary Joy has a clothing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 19000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock of ready-to-wear goods, like pants, slippers, shoes, dress, bags and other products to sell.

Mary Joy has been in this business for 4 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of ready-to-wear goods, like pants, slippers, shoes, dress, bags and other products

loans.name: Naem

texts.en:
Naem is a 40-year-old married man from Rafah city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs. 

Naem took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Naem will be able to decrease the electricity expenses. 

Naem appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Norah

texts.en:
Norah is 42 years old, married to Charles and supports a family of five children. 

She has been operating in her general retail for the last seven years earning KES14,000 per month. 

Norah has applied for her first loan of KES25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy additional retail goods like soft drinks, sugar, cooking oil and soap to sell in her retail shop.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and to start a retail shop. 

Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy additional retail goods like soft drinks, sugar, cooking oil and soap to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Emprendedoras está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, se fijaron como meta en crecimiento de cada una. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde tres señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir en una pobreza extrema.
María, integrante de este grupo, pide este préstamo para la compra de verduras, carne, hortalizas, panificados y otros insumos para poder hacer comidas, ya que a eso se dedica y es con lo cual se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta.
María se define a sí misma como una persona que quiere salir adelante y ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de su trabajo y su sacrificio.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Emprendedoras group is in its 6th loan cycle in the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other to get ahead. They established as a goal each one's growth. They are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire, where three women are below the poverty line, which is to say in extreme poverty.

María, a member of this group, asks for this loan to purchase vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other supplies to make food since she does this for work and it is with this that she earns a living in a respectable and honest way.  

María characterizes herself as a person who wants to get ahead and help her loved ones through her work and her sacrifice.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, baked goods and other supplies to make food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts, such as tyres and wheel rings, for repairs and maintenance of his motorcycle, so as to offer better and faster transportation services.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 67 years old and has five children. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosalina has been in this business for 2 years now, and has borrowed 1 time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Rosalina requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
17 son las mujeres que integran el grupo llamado Renacer, son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan por sus familias y por sus seres queridos. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde cada una quiere ir superando la situación de pobreza que presenta.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Olinda, Directora del Comité, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha mejorado bastante gracias a la venta de ropas, además es manicurista y masajista y tiene mucha clientela debido a que es conocida en la zona. Su esposo también trabaja, es zapatero y de esa forma se ayudan para poder dar a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de ropas, esmaltes, cremas y otros insumos para poder seguir con sus trabajos, luchando por mejorar cada día más en lo que hace, y con lo cual podrá ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
17 women make up the group known as Renacer. They are women who are head of their households, who work hard for their families and their loved ones. They are in the poverty elimination programme, in which each of them wants to work on overcoming their current level of poverty.

One of the members is Olinda, Director of the Board, who demonstrated a poverty level within level three in her survey. This means she has improved considerably thanks to her clothing sales. She also does manicures and is a masseuse and has a large clientele since she is well-known in the area. Her husband also works; he is a cobbler and in this way they help each other to give their family a decent life and provide everything they need.

She is asking for this loan to buy clothing, nail varnish, creams and other supplies so she can continue with her work, striving to improve all the time at what she does. By doing this she will be able to help her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing, nail varnish, creams and other supplies.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Expedito está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas y cada una de ellas está poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder ayudar a sus familias para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Nilsa, quien tiene venta de ropas quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que se encuentra en un nivel de pobreza extrema. Nilsa comenta que se ha hecho de clientela gracias a la variedad de prendas que siempre tiene y es por medio de su trabajo que tiene los medios para poder mantener a sus seres queridos. 
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remeras, camperas, pantalones, blusas, vestidos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo, luchando por poder crecer. Agradece por la oportunidad de poder mejorar cada día y con ese trabajo ayudar a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called San Expedito is in the poverty elimination program, where each and every one of them is putting forth her best effort to be able to help their families to be able to improve their living conditions. 

One of the members is Nilsa, who sells clothing and who, in the last questionnaire, showed a poverty level within level one, which is to say that she is at a level of extreme poverty. Nilsa says that she has gotten a customer base thanks to the variety of clothing that she always has and that it is through her work that she has the means to be able to support her loved ones.

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase t-shirts, jackets, pants, blouses, dresses, and more, in a way to be able to continue with her work, struggling to be able to grow. She is grateful for the opportunity to improve herself more each day and, with this work, help her loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase t-shirts, jackets, pants, blouses, dresses, and more.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Esperanza está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo, donde todas se ofrecieron a poner su mejor esfuerzo para poder crecer. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza para poder mejorar y superarse y ayudar a sus familias.
La Sra. Cinthia, una de las integrantes de este comité solicita este préstamo para la compra de variedad y más cantidad de productos  para la venta en su librería, como ser cuadernos, libros, lápices de colores, y otros, para poder seguir con el trabajo que viene haciendo. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora que quiere salir adelante.
Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con su trabajo para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The La Esperanza group is in its first loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is a new group, where they all promise to each other to put their best efforts into being able to grow. They are in the poverty elimination program to be able to improve and and better themselves and help their families.

Cinthia, one of the members of this committee, asks for this loan to purchase products in more variety and in more quantity to sell in her bookstore, such as notebooks, books, colored pencils, and more, to be able to continue with her work as she has been doing. She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who wants to get ahead.  

She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue with her work to be able to help her family.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, books, colored pencils, and more.

loans.name: Mosharif

texts.ru:
Мошарифу 23 лет, она проживает в городке под названием Куляб. Она живет с отцом и матерью. Мошариф развелась с мужем, и у нее нет детей. После развода она живет с родителям. Ее отец занимается мастером по ремонту домов. Мама работает поваром в столовой.  
Мошариф уже год занимается шитьем женской одежды в национальном стиле. После развода она начала стать самостоятельным, и зарабатывать на жизнь.  Мошариф прекрасно справляется со своей работой и количество клиентов постепенно возрастают. Мошариф обратилась за кредитом, потому что она хочет расширить маленький бизнес. Она за счет кредита решила приобрести швейные принадлежности для расширения бизнеса. У Мошариф мечта стать хорошей портнихой, и открыть свое  ателье.
texts.en:
Mosharif is 23 years old. She lives in a town with the name of Kulob. She lives with her father and mother. Mosharif is divorced and has no children. Following the divorce she lives with her parents. Her father is a home renovation foreman. Her mother works as a cook in a canteen.

Mosharif has been sewing women's clothing in the national style for a year. After the divorce she started to become independent and earn a living. Mosharif copes wonderfully with her work and her number of clients is gradually growing. Mosharif has applied for a loan because she wants to expand her small business. She has decided to use a loan to buy sewing accessories to expand her business. Mosharif's dream is to become a good seamstress and open her own studio.

loans.use: to buy sewing accessories and expand her business.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is 47 years old and married with one child. She works hard to provide for her family, running a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

Narcisa has borrowed and paid back 10 loans from NWTF before this one. She has been running her business for seven years and also earns an income from a general store. Having successfully repaid her previous loans, she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Narcisa aspires to save money to expand her businesses.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 40 years old, married, and has four children who are currently in school. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 9 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pig. Emily would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is a married woman with four children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old and has a buy and sell vegetable business in the Philippines. Elma has been in this business for 4 years.

Elma requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell.  In the future, Elma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Eden

texts.en:
Eden is a married woman, 43 years old with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Eden has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell in her stall.

She has been in this business for eight years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 71 years old and a widow with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and has been in this business for ten years. 

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food-vending business. In the future, Merlita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

loans.name: Naem

texts.en:
Naem is a 31-year-old married man from Jabalia city. He is a father of two sons and one daughter. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs. 

Naem took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, he will be able to decrease his electricity expenses. 

Naem appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es de la ciudad de Pilar, es abogado, es una persona joven trabajadora con varios clientes en la zona es un profesional muy renombrado en el ámbito jurídico. 
Jorge es un buen profesional que se desempeña muy bien en su profesión, y ya tiene muy buena clientela. Él está poniendo todo de sí para poder crecer y mejorar.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar equipos de oficina, para poder equipar su oficina y de esa forma ofrecer a sus clientes una buena atención.
texts.en:
Jorge is from the city of Pilar. He is a lawyer, a hard-working young man with various clients in the zone. He is a very well-known professional in the judicial field.

Jorge is a good professional who carries out his profession very well, and has a very good client base. He is putting his all into being able to grow and improve.

He asks for this loan to be able to purchase office equipment to be able to equip his office and in this way offer his clients good service.

loans.use: to purchase office equipment to equip the office.

loans.name: Alcides

texts.es:
El señor  Alcides es  de la ciudad de Santaní, está casado, tiene 2 hijos, quienes son el motivo de lucha de él y su esposa. Comenta que es dueño de un taller de electricidad del automóvil, con varios años de funcionamiento, también está montando una gomería.
Alcides es una persona que está poniendo todo de sí para poder crecer y mejorar cada día. Solicita el préstamo para compras de acumuladores y partes eléctricas en general, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Alcides is from the city of Santaní, is married and has 2 children, who are the motive for him and his wife to work hard. He says that he is the owner of a automotive electrical shop, which has been in business for some years. He also is opening a tire repair shop.

Alcides is a person who is putting his all into being able to grow and improve each day. He asks for the loan to purchase storage batteries and electrical parts in general, which will be a great help to be able to continue with his work as he has been doing.

loans.use: to purchase storage batteries and electrical parts in general.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 52 years old, married, and has six children who are presently in school.

She is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Marlyn has been in this business for 20 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Marlyn requested a PHP 10,500 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Shelter

texts.en:
Shelter is a 21-year-old businesswoman living in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully selling clothing for all ages and genders.  

When she is not working, Shelter serves as a Learner Guide at the nearest secondary school, providing homework assistance to students. 

With the requested loan, Shelter intends to start raising chickens to increase her sales and profits. With additional profits, she hopes to expand into a retail business, create employment for the people of her community and provide for her siblings.  

She got a first loan that she used to expand her clothing business and she repaid it successfully.

loans.use: To diversify to selling broilers

loans.name: Eda

texts.en:
Eda is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 40 years old and three of her children are in school. Eda has a fish vending business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 3 years.

Eda requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more boxes of fish to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Maria Auxiliadora está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo formado en la  ciudad de Concepción,  la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, donde las integrantes están luchando por poder mejorar.
La Sra. Zunilda es una de las integrantes, quien es manicurista, realiza este servicio en la casa de sus clientas, y comenta que le va muy bien en lo que hace, es por eso que tiene ya mucha clientela. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que lucha y se esfuerza por poder crecer y salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de esmaltes, alicates, acetonas y otros insumos para poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar y crecer.
texts.en:
The group called Maria Auxiliadora is in its first loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is a new group formed in the city of Concepción, which is a zone a bit distant from the center zone and still is developing. It is a zone which is difficult to access, where the members are struggling to be able to improve.

Zunilda is one of the members, who is a manicurist. She does this service in her clients' homes, and says that it is going very well for her, so she already has many clients. She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who struggles and works hard to be able to grow and get ahead. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of nail polish, clippers, nail polish remover, and other supplies to be able to continue providing a good service to her clients. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to improve and grow.

loans.use: to purchase nail polish, clippers, nail polish remover and other supplies.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 30-year-old single man from Jabalia city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.
 
Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, he will be able to decrease the electricity expenses. 

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 41-years-old married man from Dier El balah city. he works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income is barely covers all the family needs. Mohammad is a father for four sons.

Mohammad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to decrease the electricity expenses. 
Mohammad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house

loans.name: Lomen

texts.en: Lomen is an entrepreneur from the community of Badian, Cebu. She is 42 years old and she is engaged in raising goats and operating a general store. This has been her business for six years now, earning her PHP7000 per month. Lomen is asking a loan of PHP30000 to buy additional goats to raise, canned food, seasoning, condiments, spices, shampoo, milk, coffee and sugar. Lomen is optimistic of the future and she knows that once her store if full, it will attract more customers thus increasing her income. In the future, she plans to buy more merchandise, the ones that are not yet offered to her customers.

loans.use: to buy goats, canned food, seasoning, condiments, spices, shampoo, milk, coffee and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stock of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy motorcycle spare parts to repair and service his motorcycle and keep it in good condition so as to serve more customers and make more income to support his family.

loans.name: Rutendo

texts.en:
Rutendo is a 24-year-old businesswoman. She is single and lives in Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully selling clothing in her community.

With the requested loan, Rutendo intends to diversify to poultry rearing so that she can boost her sales volume and profits. With the additional profits she hopes to expand into a retail business, create employment for people in her community and provide for her siblings. Rutendo got a first loan that she successfully paid back. It was this loan that developed her business.

When she is not working in her business, Rutendo serves as a Cama member who volunteers to clean toilets in schools within her community.

loans.use: To diversify to poultry rearing.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 50 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

Susan runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items of groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, shampoo and other personal care products.

Susan has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items of groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks,  shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Talent

texts.en:
Talent is a 25-year-old businesswoman, living in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully selling clothes. 

She also volunteers in delivering well-being sessions to students in schools that are within her community. 

With the requested loan from Kiva, Talent intends to buy more clothes and bags. With the additional profits, she intends to further her education by enrolling in a teacher’s college to train as a primary school teacher. 

She got a first loan that she successfully repaid, and it was this loan that she used to develop her clothing business.

loans.use: To expand her clothing business.

loans.name: Talav Faliyu Mahila Mandal Group

texts.en:
This group of five women hails from Dahod, India. They are led by Kaliben, who is standing in the center. 

Kaliben is a 28-year-old mother of two children. Her household income is 11,000 INR, which is insufficient to meet the household expenses and pay for the children's education. Her monthly savings are just 2,000 INR. 

Hence, Kaliben thought of starting her own business to supplement the family's income. She started a small animal husbandry business in her backyard. With this business she is currently earning 5,000 INR, but she wants to earn more to support her children's education. 

She came up with the idea of getting a loan to expand her business. She got together with four other women who share similar interests. The other women are determined to help their families and want to expand their existing businesses as well. These families earn on average 10,000 INR per month, out of which they are able to save only 2,000 INR. 

Similar to Kaliben, the other women pursue small businesses. Together, the group seeks a loan of 50,000 INR. They will use the loan to expand their business. Your loan will help these women earn more and give a good education to their children. It will also pave the way for a good standard of living and happiness among these families.

loans.use: To expand her animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 35-year-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father of two sons and two daughters. 

He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs.
 
Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to decrease the electricity expenses.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El Sr. Roberto tiene 56 años de edad, está casado y vive con su familia en la ciudad de Carapeguá, el Sr. Roberto proviene de una familia que se dedica netamente a la fabricación y venta de artesanías, así como la tradicional sobrecama y hamacas.  Desde muy joven acompañó a su padre en la venta, así de apoco comenzó a trabajar solo, hoy en día ya tiene una muy buena clientela formada.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra sobrecamas, hamacas, frazadas y otros productos para la venta. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Roberto is 56 years old, married, and lives with his family in the city of Carapeguá. Roberto comes from a family that works purely in making and selling crafts, such as traditional bedspreads and hammocks. Since he was very young, he accompanied his father when selling, so he slowly began to work on his own. These days he has established a very good customer base.

He asks for the loan to purchase bedspreads, hammocks, blankets and other products to sell. He is grateful for the opportunity that he is getting to be able to continue with his work as he has been doing.

loans.use: to purchase bedspreads, hammocks, blankets and other products to sell.

loans.name: Jesus Misericordioso Group

texts.es:
El grupo Jesús Misericordioso está en el ciclo 14 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde cada una lucha para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ceferina ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles, que ella misma se encarga de hacer y después sale a vender de manera ambulante. Ceferina se hizo de clientela gracias a que es muy buena en lo que hace, ya que sus comestibles son muy aceptados.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras, carne, hortalizas, condimentos y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo y de esa forma poder luchar por crecer y salir adelante. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The Jesús Misericordioso group is in its 14th loan cycle in the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other to get ahead. They are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire, where each one struggles to be able to improve her living conditions and those of her family.

One of the members is Ceferina who works selling food that she is responsible for making and then she goes out to sell it as a street vendor. Ceferina created a customer base thanks to being very good at what she does, since her dishes are very agreeable.  

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase vegetables, meat, seasonings, and more, so to be able to continue with her work and in this way be able to struggle to grow and get ahead. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to improve her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, seasonings, and more.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Antonio es comerciante y tiene una despensa, está casado con la Sra. Amada y ambos tienen 3 hijos de los cuales 2 ya son independientes, que pudieron criar por medio de su sacrificio y esfuerzo.
Antonio es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que pone lo mejor de si para poder seguir trabajando y luchando. Quiere poder seguir con su trabajo para poder continuar dando una buena vida a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar productos varios para poder surtir su despensa, como ser verduras, carne, lácteos, panificados y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de mejorar.
texts.en:
Antonio is a businessman and has a store. He is married to Amada and they have 3 children, of whom 2 are already on their own, who they could raise through their sacrifices and efforts.

Antonio is a very hard-working and enterprising person who puts the best part of himself into being able to continue working and struggling. He wants to be able to continue with his work to be able to continue giving his family a good life.

He asks for this loan to be able to purchase various products to be able to stock his store, such as vegetables, meat, dairy products, baked goods, and more, in this way to be able to continue with his work as he has been doing. He is grateful for the opportunity that he is getting to improve.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, dairy products, baked goods, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm tools and certified seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to lease land and expand his farming activity to improve production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to use in construction of a greenhouse to plant more flowers and supply for more income gain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for top dressing her crops so as to get a better harvest to sell in order to meet both her clients' and her family's needs.

loans.name: Helaria

texts.en:
Helaria is 41 years old and married with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a general store business in the Philippines and has been in this business for two years. 

Helaria requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is a married woman with eleven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosalia is 40 years old and has six children who are in school.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Rosalia has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Nemia

texts.en:
Nemia is a widowed woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 58 years old and one of her children is in school.

Nemia has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 2 years.

She requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy vegetables to sell in her business. In the future, Nemia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell in her business.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene, 27, is a married woman with three children, who are all in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Irene has a buy and sell oyster business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Irene requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more oysters to sell to customers.

In the future, Irene would like to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of oysters to sell.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 30-year-old married man from Dier Al-Balah city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs. 

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. By taking this loan, he will be able to decrease the electricity expenses. 

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: El Hoda Group

texts.en:
Huda is the featured borrower for El Hoda Group and is the lady sitting in the middle. She joined with her two fellow group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have long been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and make a living at the same time.

Huda is a 40-year-old married mother of four children. Three years ago, she started selling clothes from her house to help her husband meet their family's needs and expenses. She is working hard and trying desperately to develop her business; thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her merchandise with a new collection of summer clothes that will satisfy her customers' special requests. 

With respect to the other group members, Khazma is the lady on the right and Manal is on the left.

loans.use: to increase her clothing store's merchandise with a new summer collection

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with four children. She is 50 years old and one of her children is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 6 years.

Evelyn requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients and raw products for her business.

 In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and raw products for her business.

loans.name: Arcelia

texts.en:
Arcelia is 47 years old, married and has five children. Two of her children are in school.

Arcelia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Arcelia requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

In the future, Arcelia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Angel Antonio

texts.es:
La honestidad, la responsabilidad, el esfuerzo y el espíritu emprendedor de Ángel son las características que resaltan cuando sus clientes de la pulpería que tiene hablan sobre él. Con 45 años de edad, dos hijos independientes, un negocio estable y una esposa que ha sido siempre el pilar de su vida, este comerciante se siente muy afortunado con lo que tiene.
El inicio de Ángel fue con poco dinero, pero a medida que ha ido dedicándole a su pulpería, esta ha ido creciendo con pasos firmes. Es un negocio que le ha permitido mejorar su calidad de vida, por esta razón no duda ni un segundo en invertir en él. De manera que solicita un préstamo para comprar frijoles, arroz, azúcar, avena, embutidos, gaseosas, entre otros productos de alta demanda en su negocio.  Con esto podrá ofrecer siempre lo que sus clientes andan buscando y por ende incrementará sus ganancias. El mayor plan que tiene este emprendedor es llegar a convertir su pulpería en una distribuidora.
texts.en:
Ángel's honesty, responsibility, efforts, and entrepreneurial spirit are the characteristics that stand out when the customers of his grocery store talk about him. At 45 years old, with two independent children, a stable business, and a wife who has always been a pillar in his life, this businessman feels very lucky with what he has. 

Ángel's beginnings were with very little money, but as he has been working in his grocery store, he has been growing with firm steps. It is a business that has permitted him to improve his quality of life, for this reason he doesn't hesitate even a second to invest in it. In this way, he asks for a loan to purchase beans, rice, sugar, oats, cold cuts, soft drinks, and other products that are in high demand in his business. With this, he will be able to always offer what his customers are looking for, and in the end, it will increase his earnings. The biggest plan that this entrepreneur has is to be able to convert his small grocery store into a distributor.

loans.use: to purchases beans, rice, sugar, oats, cold cuts, soft drinks, and other products.

loans.name: Tecla

texts.en:
Tecla, 21, is the primary breadwinner in her family, which makes her responsible for both her siblings and her extended family.

She used her first loan to increase her stocks and improve her sales and profits. She can now afford to pay for her siblings’ school fees. The major challenge she has faced is competition from rival businesses, which forced her to divert to groceries that had less competition, and she has penetrated the market well. 

She has used the profits from her business to diversify into the grocery market to supplement her income but ended up concentrating more on groceries than clothing. She is planning on furthering her education and she is happy that the business can provide her with all the resources needed. 

With the requested loan, Tecla would like to increase the stock levels of rice, sugar, cooking oil and soap in order to meet current demand.

loans.use: To increase the stock levels of rice, sugar, cooking oil and soap.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan tiene 31 años de edad vive en pareja, comenta que empezó trabajando desde muy joven con sus padres en el mercado vendiendo frutas, verduras y ensalada de frutas.
Actualmente tiene un vehículo con que  realiza fletes .Es un verdadero sacrificio ya que tiene que madrugar para cumplir con sus clientes. Gracias a este trabajo pudo darles una buena educación a sus hijos y llevar una vida digna.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar cubiertas y también para el arreglo de la chapería del vehículo que tiene, ya que es un medio para su trabajo. Agradece por la  oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda para realizar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Juan is 31 years old, lives with his partner, and says that he began working when he was very young with his parents in the market selling fruits, vegetables and fruit salad.

Currently, he has vehicle with which he provides transportation. It is a true sacrifice since he has to get up very early in the morning to serve his clients. Thanks to this work, he has been able to give his children a good education and have a dignified life. 

He asks for this loan to be able to purchase tires and also to do some bodywork on the vehicle that he has, since it is his means of work. 

He is grateful for the opportunity that he is receiving, since it will be a big help to do his work.

loans.use: to purchase tires and do some bodywork on the vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase shoe soles and glue for repair and maintenance of customers' shoes.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El grupo Maria Auxiliadora está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo con muchas expectativas, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rosa quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de sus ventas que tiene en el copetín que logró abrir con mucho sacrificio se ha ido ganando la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Ella es una mujer muy luchadora que pone todo de sí para poder crecer y ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar comestibles, bebidas, golosinas y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, cumpliendo con sus clientes e invirtiendo de esa forma en su negocio para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The Maria Auxiliadora group is in its first loan cycle in the women's communal bank program. It is a new group with a lot of expectations, where they all work and help each other to get ahead. They are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire to be able to improve the living conditions of each one of them. 

One of the members is Rosa who, through her efforts and continuous work, and through the sales that she has in the snack bar that she managed to open with a lot of sacrifice, has been earning her living in a dignified and honest way. She is a very determined woman who puts her all into being able to grow and help her family.

She asks for this loan to be able to purchase food, drinks, candies, and more, in this way to be able to continue with her sales, serving her customers and investing, in this way, in her business to help her family.

loans.use: to purchase good, drinks, candies, and more.

loans.name: Basilica

texts.es:
La señora Basílica es viuda desde hace tres años, tiene cuatro hijas. Tiene olería desde hace varios años, también se dedica a la ganadería, posee varios animales y cultivos varios.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, que pese a los problemas ha ido creciendo y mejorando y con ello ha ayudado a sus hijos, ella quiere seguir creciendo, es por ello que se esfuerza mucho.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su olería, como ser arcilla. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Basílica has been a widow for three years. She has four daughters. She has had a brick-making factory for some years, and also works in animal husbandry. She has a variety of animals and a variety of crops.

She is a very hard-working woman who, despite the problems, has grown and improved and with that has helped her children. She wants to continue growing, and for this she works hard.
factore
She asks for a loan to be able to purchase supplies for her brick-making factory, such as clay. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase clay for her brick-making factory.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 46 years old, married and supports a family of 5 children. He is a small scale farmer. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to lease land and expand his farming activity. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to improve the family living standards and healthcare. 

His future hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to lease land and expand his farming activity.

loans.name: Anielee

texts.en:
Anielee is a married woman with one child in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a buy and sell frozen foods business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 3 years.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy frozen foods to sell in her business. In the future, Anielee would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy frozen foods to sell in her business.

loans.name: Emelie

texts.en:
Emelie is 39 years old, married, and has three children who are in school. She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Emelie has been in this business for 5 years now, and has borrowed 9 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Emelie requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock. In the future, Emelie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
El Comité  Mujeres Activas esta en el ciclo 3ero., están iniciando con muchas expectativas ya que quieren invertir para poder mejorar sus vidas y poder salir de la pobreza. Las  integrantes en su mayoría son microempresarias y manifestaron que están muy contentas de formar parte del comité.
Mariana es una mujer muy trabajadora que quiere salir adelante, es por ello que se sacrifica para poder mejorar cada día y ofrecer a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones. Ella se dedica a la venta de perfumes, colonias y fragancias y por medio de este trabajo tiene los medios para ayudar a sus seres queridos. 
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de perfumes variados, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo, ya que así cumple con sus clientes a la vez que mejora cada día un poco más.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Activas communal bank group is in its third loan cycle, they are beginning with a lot of expectations since they want to invest to be able to improve their lives and be able to get out of poverty. The members are, in the majority, micro-business owners and said that they are very happy to be part of the communal bank. 

Mariana is a very hard-working woman who wants to get ahead, so she sacrifices to be able to improve each day and offer her family a dignified life without want. She works selling perfumes, colognes, and fragrances, and through this work has the means to help her loved ones.

She asks for this loan to purchase a variety of perfumes, and in this way be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing, since in this way she will serve her customers while she improves each day a little more.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Triunfadores De Quellomayo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “TRIUNFADORES DE QUELLOMAYO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Vilcabamba, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Leonor Vicentina ella es conviviente y tiene 34 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva plátanos, café, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “TRIUNFADORES DE QUELLOMAYO" communal bank. This bank is located in Vilcabamba district, which is part of La Convención province and Cusco district. 

The member Leonor Vicentina is partnered, 34 years old, and has 1 child. She works at her business growing fruit. The member has a plot of land where she grows plantains, coffee, mandarins, and oranges. The member works from 6:00 am to 5:00 pm. The member has been in this business for some years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her cultivated land. The member asks for the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer. 

The other members work at a business selling animals, a business selling clothing, a grocery store business, and a business selling food.

The member is grateful to those who are a part of this dream through this platform and promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock of goods and products, such as cooking oil and baking flour to sell to clients, and thus meet both client and family needs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy fabric for sewing and selling.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a 29-year-old mother of three living in the Chikomba West District of Zimbabwe. She inspires young women through volunteering in schools as a janitor and an entrepreneur. 

She started her poultry business in 2013 after noticing an increase in demand for broiler chickens.

Gladys used her $500 loan to boost her poultry business. Now she hopes that if she gets another Kiva loan, she will further expand her poultry business and build a bigger fowl run.

loans.use: To purchase more chicks and feeds.

loans.name: Alamhon

texts.ru: Мужчина на фотке Аламхон. Ему 44 лет. Он женат и у него одна 23 летняя дочка. Жена занимается поваром в столовой. Сам Аламхон 20 лет занимается по ремонту домов. Его дочь зовут Мошариф, и она дома предоставляет услуги портнихи уже года. Мошариф год назад начала свой маленький бизнес, сейчас она уже набрала опыта и рада, что умеет шить и кроить. Мошариф хочет расширить свой бизнес, но у нее нет денежных средств для купли ткани и швейные принадлежности. Аламхон решил взять кредит и помочь дочке приобрести необходимые средства для шитья. Аламхон  очень хочет помочь дочке и по этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Вы помочь Аламхону финансовыми трудностями.
texts.en: The man in the photo is Alamhon. He is 44 years old. He is married and he has a 23-year-old daughter. His wife is a cook in a canteen. Alamhon himself has been renovating houses for 20 years. His daughter is called Mosharif, and she has been offering her services as a seamstress from home for a year. A year ago Mosharif started her own small business and now she has acquired experience and is glad that she knows how to cut and sew. Mosharif wants to expand her business, but she does not have funds to buy cloth and sewing accessories. Alamhon has decided to take a loan and help his daughter to acquire the things she needs for sewing. Alamhon really wants to help his daughter and so he has applied for a loan. You can help Alamhon with his financial difficulties.

loans.use: to buy cloth and other sewing accessories for his daughter.

loans.name: Virgen De Los Angeles De Huayllacocha Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LOS ANGELES DE HUAYLLACOCHA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Huarocondo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia ella es soltera y tiene 40 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de ganaderia, la socia los hace engordar y crecer a los ganados y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de ganados. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar un ganado.



Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de ganaderia, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de agricultura.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “VIRGEN DE LOS ANGELES DE HUAYLLACOCHA” communal bank. This bank is located in Huarocondo district, which is part of Anta province and Cusco department. 

The member is Julia. She is single, 40 years old, and has 3 children. The member works at her business of animal husbandry. She fattens and raises the livestock and later she sells them at the different fairs. She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. The member, through this work, wants to get ahead. The member's dream is to expand her business of livestock sales. She asks for the loan to purchase livestock. 

The other members work at a business selling animals, a business raising animals, a grocery store business, and an agricultural business. 

The member is grateful to those who are a part of this dream through this platform and promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Sojida

texts.ru: Эту скромную, приятную, вежливую женщину с красивой улыбкой зовут Сочида. Ей 40 лет. Она мама двоих прекрасных детей. Ее сыновьям 14 и 16 лет. Сочида развелась с мужем и была вынуждена переехать с двумя маленькими детьми в отцовский дом. На сегодняшний день ее жизнь и душевное состояние более улучшилось, и она вышла на работу. Сочида работает продавщицей на местном рынке. В ассортименте ее товара Вы можете найти черешню, вишню, персики абрикос и арбузы, бананы и многое другое. Сейчас самый сезон работы для нее, так как сбор урожая начался. Сочида решила купить больше фруктов (оптом), чтобы привлечь больше клиентов. Она любит свою работу и надеется продолжить этот бизнес еще на много лет.
texts.en: This modest, pleasant, polite woman with a beautiful smile is called Sojida. She is 40 years old. She is a mother of two wonderful children. Her sons are 14 and 16 years old. Sojida divorced and needed to move into her father's house with her two small children. Today her life and mental state have much improved, and she has started working. Sojida works as a trader at the local market. In her range of stock you can find cherries, black cherries, peaches, apricots and watermelon, bananas, and much more. Now is the peak work season for her since the harvest has begun. Sojida has decided to buy more fruit (wholesale) in order to attract more clients. She loves her work and hopes to continue this business for many years to come.

loans.use: to buy fruit from the latest harvest.

loans.name: Las Hijas De Maria Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al  banco comunal “Las Hijas de María” en la ciudad del Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco.
La socia Ninoska continua dedicándose a la venta de licores, la socia lleva años dedicándose al negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de licores entre otros.
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Las Hijas de María" communal bank in the city of Cusco, Cusco province, Cusco department.

The member, Nonoska, continues working selling liquor. She has worked in this business for years, which is going well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into her business each day. The member is a responsible and determined person, and in this way she gets her family ahead.

The member asks for the loan to purchase liquor and more.

The members in general are grateful for the offered opportunity and promise to make their various payments on the established schedules.

The person whose face is covered is not part of the communal bank.

The members who are in the attached photo asked permission to arrive to the meeting late, due to work. hwo

loans.use: to purchase liquor and more.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a 19-year-old businesswoman who lives in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe. She has been selling clothes. During her spare time, Jane volunteers as a Learner Guide instructing well-being sessions at local secondary schools. She also got a first loan that she used to develop her clothing business. 

With the requested loan, Jane plans to diversify into poultry rearing and improve her sales and profits. With improved profits, she plans to re-enroll in classes at school.

loans.use: to diversify into poultry rearing.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.en:
Rosa Maria is 42 years old. She is married with four children. Her eldest is 18 and the youngest is 6. 

Rosa Maria has been raising hogs for 10 years now. She usually earns PHP 10,000 every four months. 

She is asking for a loan to buy feed for her hogs, food for her family and pay for school fees. In the future, Rosa Maria plans to buy a multicab (a vehicle to transport up to 20 passengers) for additional business.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs, food for her family and pay for school fees

loans.name: Saturdino

texts.es:
Sturdino siempre quiso ser como su padre, desde pequeño, este comerciante y agricultor de 48 años de edad, miraba a su papá cultivar café, lo que lo llevó a la iniciativa de trabajar con su padre en su adolescencia. Con más de 28 años de experiencia cortando café, cultivando, comprando y vendiendo vacas y cerdos,   este hombre luchador ha sacado adelante a su esposa, a su hija y a sus dos nietos, uno de tres años y el otro de cuatro meses.
Actualmente el esfuerzo y la dedicación de Saturdino lo han convertido en un hombre de negocio, pues posee su propia pulpería, con la ayuda de su esposa e hija. Él sueña con ver su venta más surtida y con mejorar las condiciones de su finca, por esta razón, solicita un préstamo para comprar azúcar, gaseosas, avena, sopas instantáneas, entre otros productos que a diario se venden. Con esta inversión podrá vender más productos para ahorrar y así aprovechar las ganancias para la próxima cosecha.
texts.en:
Sturdino has always wanted to be like his father. Since he was little, this 48-year-old businessman and farmer watched his father grow coffee, which gave him the initiative to work with his father as a teenager. With more than 28 years of experience cutting coffee, cultivating, purchasing and selling cows and pigs, this determined man has gotten ahead with his wife, his daughter and his two grandchildren, one age 3 and the other 4 months old. 

Now, Saturdino's efforts and dedication have made him a businessman since he has his own grocery store with the help of his wife and daughter. He dreams of seeing his store be better stocked and have better conditions on his farm. For this reason, he asks for a loan to purchase sugar, soft drinks, oats, instant soups, and other products which he sells daily. With this investment, he will be able to sell more products to save up and in this way take advantage of the earnings for the next harvest.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, soft drinks, oats, instant soups, and other products.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Por más de cuarenta años, la finca de Julio está decorada por un sin número de árboles frutales que le han servido para el sustento de su hogar, de su esposa y cinco hijos menores de edad. Este hombre de 52 años de edad, ha trabajado en la agricultura desde pequeño, teniendo de ejemplo a su padre, quien también cultivaba. Actualmente posee hectáreas de granadia y de café.  
Ahora él es el papá que le enseña a sus hijos a trabajar la tierra, pues con más de cuarenta años de experiencia, sus pequeños se han inspirado por él. Julio se siente alegre porque ha sacado adelante a su familia gracias a su negocio, por lo que se siente motivado a invertir en su nueva cosecha. De manera que solicita un préstamo para comprar abono, fertilizantes y semilla para el nuevo cultivo. Con esto podrá sembrar más cantidades y tener productos de calidad, que lo llevaran a tener excelente ganancias. En sus planes está sembrar árboles de cedro para variar sus ventas.
texts.en:
For over forty years, Julio's farm has been decorated by countless fruit trees which have served to sustain his household, of his wife and five children who are minors. This 52-year-old man has worked in agriculture since he was little, having his father as an example, who also farmed. Currently he has hectares of passion fruit and coffee. 

Now he is the father who teaches his children to work the land, since with more than forty years of experience, his little ones are inspired by him.

Julio is happy because he has gotten his family ahead thanks to his business, so he is motivated to invest in the new crop. In this way, he asks for a loan to purchase manure, fertilizers, and seeds for the new crop. With this, he will be able to plant more quantities and have quality products, which will bring excellent earnings. In his plans are to plant ceder trees to vary his sales.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizers, and seeds for the new crop.

loans.name: Khalifabibi

texts.ru: Халифабиби из самой теплей мести Республики Таджикистан. Она в Чиликуле живет вместе с мужем, сыновья находятся на заработках в Российской федерации и они каждый месяц отправляют деньги домой родителям. Ее дети заботливые, трудолюбивые как Халифабиби. Халифабиби очень счастливая, что у нее есть такие сыновья. За счет  денег, которые сыновья отправлять, Халифабиби тратить их на продукты и на другие расходы. Она каждый год собирается отремонтировать дом, но у нее не получается копить  определенную сумму денег на ремонт. И Халифабиби из-за нехватки денежных средств решила взять кредит и отремонтировать дом. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей отремонтировать дом и улучшить жилищные условия.
texts.en: Khalifabibi is from the warmest place in the Republic of Tajikistan. She lives in Jilikul with her husband. Her sons are away working in the Russian Federation and they send money home to their parents each month. Her children are caring and hard-working like Khalifabibi. Khalifabibi is very happy that she has such sons. Using the money that her sons send, Khalifabibi spends it on food and other expenses. Every year she wants to renovate her house, but she is not able to save up the necessary sum for the renovations. Because of Khalifabibi's lack of funds she has decided to take a loan and renovate her house. The requested loan will help her to renovate the house and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add stock of household goods and toiletries

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргизе 37 лет. Она замужняя женщина с четырьмя детьми. Наргиза 10 лет своей жизни посвятила растениеводству. Она выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Сейчас самый сезон ее работы. Она планирует собрать урожай и посадить новый. Для этого ей нужно купить минеральные удобрения и горючего для трактора. Денежных средств ей не хватает, и она обратилась за кредитом. Наргиза верит, что ей поддержат, и заранее говорит Вам спасибо.
texts.en: Nargiza is 37 years old. She is a married woman with four children. Nargiza has been growing crops for 10 years of her life. She is an arable farmer. Now it is her main working season. She plans to gather her harvest and plant a new crop. For this she needs to buy mineral fertilizer and tractor fuel. She does not have enough funds, and she has applied for a loan. Nargiza believes that she will be supported, and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to by mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Because Alaa is a conservative woman, she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Alaa is a 28-year-old married woman with two children. Her husband is retired from the army with a low pension; therefore, he decided to start his own business and opened an industrial equipment rental shop.

Alaa has always helped her husband, and she is working hard to save money to educate her children with the best education. Lately she is feeling that her husband needs money to expand his work and buy more products, so she has applied for a loan to buy new equipment to rent to expand his work to increase their income and improve their standards of living.

loans.use: to buy a new equipment to rent and expand her husband's work

loans.name: Ivan Marcelino

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES UNIDAS, él socio continua dedicándose a  brindar el servicio de transporte, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su trabajo el cual le trae satisfacciones personales entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
EL socio solicita el crédito para realizar el cambio de aceite entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “Mujeres Unidas” communal bank. He is a responsible and diligent person. He continues to work offering transportation services; he has been doing this line of work for a good while now, and it gives him personal satisfaction, among other benefits—it is the way that he gets his family ahead.

He is asking for this loan for an oil change, among other things.

He is grateful for the loan that was granted and is committed to making his established payments.

loans.use: to get an oil change, among other things.

loans.name: Corsina

texts.en:
Corsina is a woman from Moalboal, Cebu. She is 48 years old and a mother to a 15-year-old boy. 

Corsina has owned a general store for five years now. She is asking for a loan to buy noodles, canned goods, and items in sachets like coffee, shampoo, bath soap, detergent powder and chips. 

In the future, she aspire to improve her livelihood and expand her business for better revenue so that she can build her own house.

loans.use: to buy noodles, canned goods and items in sachets like coffee, shampoo, bath soap, detergent powder and chips

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Edna is 47 years old, and one of her children is in school.

Edna has a general store business in the Philippines. Edna requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy items to sell in her store, like canned goods, personal care products, etc. 

She has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Edna would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store, like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Hinda

texts.en:
Hinda is 30 years old. She is married and has two children. She buys sheep and goats and then she fattens them. After the sheep and goats mature and become fat, she sells them to the market to get profit. Buying and selling sheep and goats in Somaliland is profitable. 

Hinda is the breadwinner of her household, and she manages her family as her husband is not fit mentally. 

Hinda wants to to buy more sheep and goats to increase her working capital. She requested a loan of $300 from Kaaba MFI, and Hinda will pay monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats for trading purposes.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es: Juana de 50 años de edad vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos de 27, 25, 21 y 4 años de edad a los que con mucho sacrificio los ha sacado adelante ya que ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y además muy reconocida por sus vecinos.  Juana es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas desde hace 18 años, también cuenta con una tienda de productos básicos de primera necesidad y un molino que le han permitido  obtener buenos ingresos económicos.  Juana se ha dado cuenta que a diario las exigencias de sus clientes por nuevos y variados productos a aumentado, y a tomado la decisión de  adquirir un crédito en FUSAI para comprar: granos básicos, verduras, harinas y otros productos de primera necesidad  para de esta manera poder cumplir con la demanda de productos por parte de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juana, age 50, lives in her own house together with her husband and her four children, ages 4, 21, 25, and 27.  She has gotten them ahead thanks to a lot of sacrifice on her part.  She is a very hardworking woman, well-known among her neighbors.  

Juana is an enterprising woman who has worked making and selling tortillas for 18 years.  She also has a mill and a store selling staples, which have allowed her to earn a good income.

Juana has realized that every day her customers’ requests for new and varied products grow.  She has made a decision to get a loan from FUSAI to buy: basic grains, vegetables, flour, and other staple products in order to be able to better meet her customers’ needs.

loans.use: to buy: basic grains, vegetables, flour, and other staples in order to meet her customers' demands.

loans.name: Kudzai

texts.en:
Kudzai is a 26-year-old businesswoman. She is married with one child and lives in the Shurugwi District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully selling clothes and her business has grown because of the first loan that she received from Kiva. She also successfully repaid the loan. 

In her spare time, Kudzai volunteers as a community health trainer at local schools within the community, disseminating health information. With this second loan she is requesting, Kudzai intends to buy more clothes and blankets to sell. In this way, she will be able to increase her sales and profits, thereby expanding her business and creating employment opportunities for her community.
